484360.name: Mysterium VR Demo
484360.description:
VRZ: SHOOTER DEMO!

VRZ is an all-new take on the VR experience, where you can use realist weapons and tactics while fighting off an unending zombie horde! We are now offering a new FREE shooter demo that will let you test components of the final game.

With just over 40+ hours of gameplay, we deliver one hell of a ride to those who support us. Players will find Purgatory Island to be plagued with impossible unlife, with a variety of zombie skags roaming its rancid paradise and posing an unyielding threat. Some of these zombies will grow more Toxic (and intelligent), having been driven beyond their primal urges to hunt and destroy you! Survive long enough, and you may just discover the path to salvation. You the player are the secret experiment, the rat in the maze, and you’ll need both wit and brawn to overcome the challenges ahead!

You can find the full game by searching VRZ, but till then, keep on fragging!
484360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
